item.description:
Meet Genuine Scooter Company's President Phillip McCaleb


Mark Your Calendar- Saturday, October 29th
Ride of The Year!! - Meet Genuine's Phill McCaleb, Join the Ride, FREE PARTY!!!!!! Meet The President




(Phil McCaleb- Founder and President of Genuine Scooter Company) called us with the idea to come to Boston and hold a "Founders Day" Ride. The ride is starting at  Scooters Go Green.  Join us for the largest ride of the year.  Phil wants an opportunity to meet the  Boston Genuine Scooter riders in person, hang out kick tires, ride together and end the day with a party (Free Food and Soft Drinks for ALL Genuine Scooter Owners) Don't miss this event,  join us for the last ride of the season!!!


The Ride



ATTENTION ALL GENUINE SCOOTER OWNERS.  You are invited to our largest ride of the season with Genuine Scooter Company's founder and President, Phillip McCaleb.  This ride is dedicated to our customer appreciation.  Phillip will be joining us on the ride throughout the city with the final destination at Harvard Square's delicious Fire on ice for an all you can eat Mongolian style grill.  Get your Buddy, Stella, R50, or Rattler prepped, waxed, and shined for Saturday, October 29 @ 1pm  at Scooters Go Green (RIDE BEGINS AT 1:30)

 

The Party!!



Fire on Ice- The" Founder's Ride" will conclude at Fire on Ice in Harvard Square, Cambridge MA.  ALL GENUINE SCOOTER OWNERS/RIDERS WILL EAT FOR FREE!  Thats right, you heard it correctly, so leave your wallet at home and join us after the ride with Genuine Scooter CO. Founder, Phillip McCaleb.  All food and soft drinks will be fully paid for and all Genuine Scooter Owners will eat for free!  It's on the House!




 

 About Phil..

 

Phillip McCaleb (Founder of Genuine Scooter Co.) worked in the corporate world. He spent several years stationed in Greece and Belgium, among other overseas locations. While in Greece in particular, McCaleb noticed that everyone enjoyed getting around on scooters. It didn't take long for him to recognize that scooters are not only incredibly practical, but super fun to ride! Pretty soon, he was hooked and adopted a vintage scooter as his daily transport. Some of his fondest memories are cruising around the busy streets of Athens on two wheels.

Upon his return to the states, McCaleb didn't see millions of people driving around in cars. Instead, he saw millions of people who loved scooters (they just didn't know it yet).  
So in 1989, McCaleb started restoring and selling vintage Vespa and Lambretta scooters out of his garage on the north side of Chicago. Some of his early clients were celebrities and rock stars.  You don't have to look hard to find Buddy scooter clubs and enthusiastic online user groups such as those found on www.modernbuddy.com. We think this demonstrates that Genuine's modern machines feature all the charm and fun of the old classics (minus the hard-to-find parts and repair bills!)


Let us know your in!   
We need an accurate head count for reservations, the route and scooter parking for the day, so give us a call (617) 269-0050  or shoot us an email and let us know that your going to participate!!!   Thank you all for a great season and making Scooters Go Green #1!!!  See ya there!

Steve & Steve
item.name: Meet Genuine Scooter President - "Founders Ride" October 29th
